tokenlightcond-config-addEffects-hint: Enable to add lighting condition effects to tokens. Disable to only track lighting with flags (TokenHUD will still work).
tokenlightcond-config-delaycalculations-: Delays the light condition calculation by the configured miliseconds.
tokenlightcond-config-globalIllumination: Enable use of Global Illumination settings in determining token light conditions.
tokenlightcond-config-negativelights-hin: Negative luminance will provide dim or dark conditions instead of removing them.
tokenlightcond-config-showTokenHud-hint: Choose to display the Hud element when right clicking on token.
